plugin.name: unshorten
plugin.author: Jonathan Griggs
plugin.title: Unshorten provides the ability to expand shortened HTTP links to their full, original size without the use of a third-party API
plugin.description: \ Provides an UnshortenService to expand links that have been shortened by any redirecting Link Shortener (ex. T.Co, Bit.ly, TinyURL). Backed by a LRU Cache of Expanded Links with a configurable maximum size for optimal performance
